summary: This is a simple fix that patches the equipment added by Wet and Cold to make it playable by children.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple fix that patches the equipment added by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27563/?]Wet and Cold [/url]to make it playable by children. I use a combination of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55555/?]RS Children Overhaul [/url]and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52253/?]Xvision Playable Children. [/url]Just make sure you use override with RS Children. The first one has better
looking children and the second makes all the base armors playable.

Requirements - Wet and Cold

Install - You must replace the .esp with this one and it will work. (I'm a noob
so I don't know how to have it separate otherwise.)

Thanks to isoku for the cool mod![url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?]
[/url]
-deedlesndeedles
author: Deedlesndeedles

files.name: Wet and Cold v1_422 Child Playable
